function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Infectious disease outbreaks and epidemics","Impact":"Tremendous impacts on public health, health care systems, and businesses","Mitigation":"Implement infection control measures and workplace safety protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, ventilation systems, and disinfection technologies","People":"Employees, visitors, and the general public","Owner":"Organizations, building owners, and facility managers"}]}
